I made sure to let Sara know about how\nShuri had 'run away.'%K%P
She could probably smooth things over with\nBishamonten for us.%K%P
'Good morning, Yamato!\nBreakfast is ready.'%K%P
'I'll be right there.'%K%P
'I made the fried eggs myself.\nBe sure to savor your girlfriend's home cooking!'%K%P
'Don't take too long, OK?'%K%P
Shuri left the room, her skirt twirling behind her.%K%P
Captivated, my gaze followed her as she went.%K%P
'...I think I could get used to this.'%K%P
Getting to be with Shuri from first thing in the\nmorning was fantastic.%K%P
It was a great start to Shuri's stay in our house.%K%P
Of course, it's not like we were together\n24 hours a day.\nWe both had our own stuff to take care of.%K%P
Around noon we'd meet up at the park\nfor Shuri's training.%K%P
In that respect, things were the same as ever.%K%P
'Yamato, Kagura said she's finishing early today,\nhow about we call it a day for now?'%K%P
'Sure. Let's pack up and head home.'%K%P
This was where our routine changed.%K%P
Before, we would have gone our separate ways,\nbut now 'home' was the same place for\nboth Shuri and I.%K%P
'Hey, do you have some time to spare?\nYour mom asked me to pick up a few things.'%K%P
'Sure, I'll help you carry it back.'%K%P
'Thanks.'%K%P
A little shopping trip on the way home.%K%P
And we were buying ingredients for dinner, too.\nIt was like we were already newlyweds or something.%K%P
Shuri still acted a little shy when we were together,\nbut I felt much more awkward.%K%P
Even so, this wasn't a bad at all.%K%P
And Shuri wasn't exactly hiding the fact that she\nwas enjoying spending time as a couple.%K%P
'So, how is my Sakimitama...?'%K%P
After dinner, we would check how strong it was.%K%P
We had to ascertain how much power Shuri was gaining\nfrom my emotions, and put it to use to help her.%K%P
'It's great, just like always...'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
'Of course. That's one of the reasons we chose you\nas our human representative and adviser to the duo.'%K%P
I wasn't too sure of the details, but apparently\nmy Sakimitama was pretty hot stuff.%K%P
The problem was how we could use it\nto Shuri's advantage.%K%P
'Its quality has definitely improved since we\nstarted going out, but it might be too soon\nto expect results.'%K%P
'I guess just living together doesn't\nchange it all that much...'%K%P
Shuri fell silent.%K%P
All I could do was gaze at her thoughtful expression.%K%P
'What's a beautiful goddess like you\ndoing with a guy like me?'%K%P
'Huh? Where did that come from?'%K%P
'I'm just having trouble believing my luck.'%K%P
'Us getting together had nothing to do with luck.'%K%P
'It happened because you truly care about me.\nBecause you've been supporting me this whole time.'%K%P
'The sincerity of your feelings\nreally shone through.'%K%P
So she wasn't just moved by what I said.%K%P
My words had been so packed with love that Shuri\nunderstood how much she meant to me.%K%P
'I hope I can live up to those feelings.\nI want you to love me even more as your girlfriend\nso please keep being you.'%K%P
This had started out as just a strategy to help win\nthe audition, but emotionally it was more than that.%K%P
I didn't want to waste this chance. I hoped we'd\nget to know each other even better and deepen\nthe affection we felt.%K%P
And if doing that helped Shuri professionally,\nI couldn't ask for anything more.%K%P
